properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI; Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 4 at 9:46PM EST until January 6 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 20 knots from the west with
gusts up to 32 knots. Gusts to 35 knots are possible. The
largest significant waves will be 4 feet with a potential
maximum wave height of 7 feet.

* WHERE...Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to
Inner Saginaw Bay, Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to
Bay Port MI and Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 11 AM EST Monday
with the largest waves expected around 11 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
